overview: Devoted daddy Rodney Steele has buried himself in his work since his son went away to college. His hot assistant (Killian James) is always happy to provide sexual relief to the older man, but Rodney misses playing Daddy, and it seems nothing can fill that void. That is, until he discovers his son's best friend (Kory Houston) has been squatting in his back yard shed, seeking solace from fighting parents. Rodney welcomes Kory to stay in the main house, and soon he's happily playing Daddy again. But young, neglected Kory finds himself developing other feelings for his new Daddy. The question is, does Rodney feel the same?
tagline: WHILE HIS SON'S AWAY, THIS DADDY NEEDS TO PLAY
title: His Son's Best Friend 2
